# isVideoFieldModeSupported

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the connection supports setting a video field mode.

## Declaration

```swift
var isVideoFieldModeSupported: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

The property only applies to a video connection’s [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptureConnection/videoFieldMode] property.

## Interlacing video

- **videoFieldMode**: A setting that tells the connection how to interlace video flowing through it.
- **AVVideoFieldMode**: Constants that indicate which interlacing modes the connection applies to video flowing through it.
